title: 4.1 Master Challenge 2
question: Create a countdown timer to display a birthday message. The timer starts at 10. When it reaches 0, make the timer disappear and display the birthday message.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
